Create the SocialLink on the ClubJudge Venue.

Example

Creates a link between venue 221 and the social network facebook

curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST / -d '{"slug": "facebook", "href": "http://facebook.com/mybook", name: "Facebook"}' / https://bifrost.clubjudge.com/v2/venues/221/socialLinks.json?token=userToken
